description:
**Overview**
 Azure is the world’s leading cloud offering, trusted by hundreds of millions of users worldwide. As customers increasingly depend on large‑scale cloud compute for mission‑critical workloads, Microsoft continues to invest deeply in building reliable, scalable, and efficient compute infrastructure.

This team is responsible for the software systems that provision, manage, scale, and operate Azure’s global compute fleet, forming the backbone that enables reliability, performance, security, and cost efficiency at cloud scale.

* Design, implement, and maintain distributed services and automation tools that support the foundational compute fleet layer of the Azure platform..

 slice
 



 A new bank for a new India.

**About the team** 




  





 Everything that you see on the internet \\- developers made it. Even the page that you’ve opened right now and are reading this very line from \\- a developer. A team so supportive \\- even if you miss a ‘;’ in your code, they got your back till the code runs successfully.

 We are looking for an experienced Backend developer to join our technology team. * Design and develop microservices that can work in a large\\-scale multi\\-tenant environment.

**What You will need**



* At least 1 year of experience in server\\-side development.

* Curiosity to explore cutting\\-edge technologies and bake them into the products.
* Zeal and drive to take end\\-to\\-end ownership.

 Life so good, you’d think we’re kidding:
